name: Unknown Visit 2.0
description:
One day some unknown aliens came to earth and started capturing humans. You are one of the best Ninja, and its your responsibility to find the alien ship and then kill there leader.

This is the updated version of Unknown Visit (old version)

 In this update 

  • All the UI has been enhanced
  • Color correction have been made in all the levels
  • Level 3 has been redesigned completely
  • Added cutscenes for better understanding
  • Added option to change size and position of the buttons ( Custom HUD )
  • Redesign, Enhanced Boss Fight
  • Attack speed has been increased when throwing blade.
